homePageData.title: Coca Cola Great Britain
homePageData.subtitle: Founded in 1886 by pharmacist Dr John S Pemberton in Atlanta, Georgia
homePageData.description: The Coca‑Cola Company is the world's leading manufacturer, marketer and distributor of non-alcoholic beverage concentrates and syrups, and produces nearly 400 brands.

homePageData.title: Fanta
homePageData.subtitle: Bright, bubbly and made with five per cent juice
homePageData.description: Fanta is a soft drink with a tingly, fruity taste.

homePageData.title: Coca‑Cola Energy
homePageData.subtitle: The only energy drink with a great Coca‑Cola taste!
homePageData.description: With caffeine from naturally-derived sources, guarana extracts and B vitamins, and completely taurine-free, Coca‑Cola Energy is here to complement your upbeat and busy life. Niacin (Vitamin B3) and Vitamin B6 contribute to normal energy-yielding metabolism. Consume as part of a varied and balanced diet and healthy lifestyle

homePageData.title: Schweppes Classic
homePageData.subtitle: Feel the fabulous fizz of Schweppes Classic
homePageData.description: Delicately balanced mixers sparkling with brilliant bubbles. Made for mixing - or simply to quench your thirst.
